section.title: Microsoft Outlook with Eclipse
section.para: This example assumes you running an MS operating system and that you have a version of Outlook installed.

section.title: Create Project
section.para: Create a new project "de.vogella.microsoft.outlook". See Eclipse RCP for details. Use the "Hello RCP " as a template.

section.title: Create a command
section.para: Using extensions create the command "de.vogella.microsoft.outlook.sendEmail" and add it to the menu. See Eclipse command for details. Program the default handler "de.vogella.microsoft.outlook.handler.SendEmail"
The following code creates and opens the email for the user. It also assumes that you have a file c:\temp\test.txt which will be attached to the email.
If you now start the application and press the button an email should be prepared and shown to the user.
